analysis.Summary: Vue component for handling organization invitation by allowing a user to set a password and complete registration via an invite link.
analysis.Purpose: Renders an invite-based signup form, validates password inputs, calls the signup action with invite code, and redirects to the user's profile.

Components.name: Field
Components.responsibility: Renders an input field with v-model binding and validation support.

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Renders a button that triggers form submission and post-signup redirect.

Components.name: Tab
Components.responsibility: Imported but not used in this component; generally provides tabbed navigation.

Functions.name: onMounted (lifecycle hook)
Functions.purpose: Fetch invite details from the server using the invite code in the URL.

Functions.name: onSubmit
Functions.purpose: Validate password inputs and invoke the signup action with user data, invite type, and code.

Functions.name: redirectTo
Functions.purpose: Navigate to the newly created user's profile page after successful signup.

analysis.Usage: Registered as a view component in the router configuration for invite-based signup. Users access it via a link containing inviteCode and type query parameters.
Notes: The Tab component is imported but not used in this file.
No user-facing error messages on signup failure; errors are logged to console only.
Slide-fade CSS transitions are defined but not applied in this template.
Error handling in onSubmit throws a generic Error without message.
